title: Unusually  high ping after 7.2 patch
body:
So basically , I may not have the best internet connection in the world but after 7.2 patch update i noticed huge difference in stable MS (ping).
I'm playing league more than 2 years and whole this time i had stable  90-95 MS(ping) in game ,i know its not the best thing but i was used to it,but after this update  i have stable 125-130 which seems to be very Laggy in terms of response time and its very noticeable. 
Funny part is i downloaded program called [lol ping checker](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4m7t9l/lol_ping_checker_for_windows/)   and its showing 90 - 95 ping but  in game I have 125-130 which i mentioned above. please help me to resolve my problem. thank you.

replies.body:
Hello, I have the same issue

PING OVER TIME

Your average ping was 32 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 50ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.

PACKET LOSS OVER TIME
 

Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 1.23%.

Overall, this means you had a low amount of packets lost during the game.

It sounds like you might be having some packet loss or some problem holding a strong connection to our game servers.  I rather you run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) as a more official source and overview of what's going on.  Should my suspicions confirm a network issue, try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help and test it in a custom game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I'm pretty sure i don't have any packet loss. All I'm trying to say is that my average ping is much higher than it should be all the time only in league.
You could be right, but I can't really say for sure without some of those logs.  Let let me know what the log reader shows for your impacted games so we can take a look.
